description.value:
You sow seeds of confusion in your target's mind, causing their actions and thoughts to become clumsy.

Critical Success The target is unaffected.

Success The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Clumsy]{Clumsy 1} and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Stupefied]{Stupefied 1}.

Failure The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Clumsy]{Clumsy 2} and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Stupefied]{Stupefied 2}.

Critical Failure The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Clumsy]{Clumsy 3}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Stupefied]{Stupefied 3}, and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Confused].
